  3. BOM&HI

Park Bom

Lee Hi

Introduction

BOM&HI was a duo project unit under YG Entertainment. The duo was created for the YG x Samsung Music Project. The unit released their very first single “All I Want For Christmas Is You” in December 20, 2013 and disbanded when Park Bom left YG Entertainment in 2016.
